sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from './services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { userData: any; user_name: string = 'johnpapa'; // Initial value for name activePage: number | undefined; constructor(private apiService: ApiService) {} title = "hello"; ngOnInit() { this.fetchUserData(this.user_name); } error: string | null = null; // Method to fetch user data fetchUserData(name: string) { this.apiService.getUser(this.user_name).subscribe((data: any) => { this.userData = data; console.log(data); }); } updateUserName() { // This method will be triggered when the "Submit" button is clicked // Update the user_name with the input value, and then fetch user data if (this.user_name.trim() === '') { // Check if the input is empty or contains only whitespace this.error = 'Please enter a valid username.'; } else { this.fetchUserData(this.user_name); this.error = null; // Reset the error message } } // Method to change the name and fetch new user data changeNameAndFetchData(newName: string) { this.user_name = newName; this.fetchUserData(this.user_name); } changeActivePage(newPage: number) { this.activePage = newPage; } }
